'''''ammen''''' is a [[Sindarin]] adverb meaning  "to us" or "for us".<ref name=PE17>{{PE|17}}, pp. 38, 45</ref>
==Etymology==
The word consists of ''[[an]]'' ("to, for") + ''[[Men (Elvish)#Sindarin|men]]'' ("us").<ref name=PE17/>

==Phrases==
*''naur an edraith '''ammen'''''<ref name=FR>{{HM|FR}}</ref>
*''edro hi '''ammen!'''''<ref name=FR/>
